mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (login_id) AS count FROM user_account WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT COUNT (email) AS count FROM user_account WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_account ( login_id, password, name, email, login_type, activated, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{loginType}, #{activated}, NOW(), NOW() )
INSERT INTO user_authority ( user_id, role, used_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{role}, #{usedAt}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
